justification: Doesn’t model Team B’s beliefs or needs. B already has two healthy QBs and an IR star, so Trevor Roberts (Tier 5) isn’t valuable. B’s biggest hole is TE, but Chris Lewis is doubtful with limited receiving upside—unlikely to appeal to a manager who trusts expert rankings. Meanwhile, Darian Campbell fits B’s rookie/upside preference with ascending usage and friendly playoff slate, making him hard to pry away. Offer is roster-coherent for A but lopsided. Rationale is generic and A-centric.
